alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jupiter, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Port Of Palm Beach, North County Airport, Juno Ridge, Mangonia Park, Fau North Campus, Philo Farms, Limestone Creek, Caloosa and Jupiter Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
